page.title: 09 HEALTH
page.content: Maud Hospital was built in 1867 and there are 29 geriatric patients in the hospital at the moment.There are 27 nurses that do day duty and night duty using 10 wards;10 rooms are not used There is a big garden and a summer house,a budgie and a tank of fish. The Doctor's Surgery is held in a room in the Station Hotel.A visiting doctor is there each weekday at midday for one hour and there is an afternoon surgery of one hour also.If you get a prescription you can either hand it in at the Post Office(this is what an elderly person or someone who has no car has to do), or you can drive to the Chemist in the next village 4 miles away. If someone is seriously ill,has an accident or is getting an operation they go to Aberdeen.
